resources.string: This device doesn\'t support Camera2 API.

say Currency to detect the currency. 
 Say Object detection to detect the object. 
 say scan the qr to get the product details. 
 Say reminder to create the reminder. 
 Say Call to call the number. 
 Say phone transfer to transfer the amount using phone number. 
 Say bank transfer to transfer the amount using account number. 
 Say Message to read the messages. 
 Say Exit to close the application.
